Introduction
This topic contains information on the
Income Reminder Letter
, including
purpose of the Income Reminder Letter
how stations of origination (SOO) are alerted that system generation of an
Income Reminder Letter
failed
, and
language to include in a locally-generated
Income Reminder Letter
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E - Pension - Basic Rate Determinations
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E
